title: Twitter’s $42,000-per-Month API Prices Out Nearly Everyone
description: Tiers will start at $500,000 a year for access to 0.3 percent of the company’s tweets. Researchers say that’s too much for too little data.

title: How to Start an AI Panic
description: The Center for Humane Technology stoked conversation about the dangers of social media. Now it’s warning that artificial intelligence is as dangerous as nuclear weapons.

title: Get Ready to Meet the ChatGPT Clones
description: The technology behind OpenAI’s viral chatbot is set to become widely replicated, unleashing a tidal wave of bots.
